name: Premium Miniket Rice
description: Extra-long grain and double-polished to ensure a silk-like texture. Sourced from the fertile lands of Dinajpur, it is aged for at least 12 months for perfect non-sticky consistency. Ideal for daily meals.

name: Local Diamond Potato
description: Freshly harvested from the Munshiganj region. Known for thin skin and creamy interior, perfect for crispy fries or traditional curries. Hand-sorted to ensure zero blemishes.

name: Pure Refined Soybean Oil
description: Fortified with Vitamin A and D, undergoing a 5-step filtration process. High smoke point makes it the healthiest choice for deep frying and everyday saut√©ing.

name: Organic Red Lentils
description: High-protein, unpolished red lentils sourced from organic farms. Easy to cook and provides an excellent source of fiber and iron. Thickens naturally into a rich, savory stew.

name: Nazirshail Rice
description: A traditional favorite, this slender grain rice is known for its distinct aroma and high nutritional value. Perfect for making traditional Bengali dishes or steamed rice.

name: Cold-Pressed Mustard Oil
description: Extracted using traditional wooden Ghani methods to preserve natural pungency and antioxidants. Perfect for pickles, bhartas, and authentic regional cooking.

name: Premium Chickpeas (Chola)
description: Large-sized, high-grade chickpeas. These are sorted for uniformity in size to ensure even cooking. Rich in protein and ideal for salads or spiced snacks.

name: Organic Turmeric Powder
description: Grown without synthetic pesticides. Our turmeric powder contains high curcumin levels, providing deep color and powerful medicinal benefits to every dish.

name: Fresh Red Onions
description: Pungent and crispy local red onions. Perfect as a base for curries or served raw in salads. We source only the firmest bulbs for maximum shelf life.

name: Iodized Salt
description: Triple-refined, vacuum-evaporated salt with the perfect amount of iodine. Pure white crystals that dissolve quickly and enhance every flavor profile.

name: Chinigura Fragrant Rice
description: Tiny, pearl-like grains with an intoxicating aroma. This is the ultimate choice for Polau, Biryani, and Zarda. Highly aromatic and non-sticky.

name: Premium Garlic
description: Large, easy-to-peel cloves with intense flavor. Essential for building the aromatic base of almost any savory dish. Locally sourced and dried properly.

name: Mung Dal (Yellow)
description: Premium yellow mung lentils, lightly roasted for a nutty aroma. Easy to digest and packed with nutrients. A comforting choice for daily meals.

name: Sugar (Refined)
description: Pure white refined sugar made from sugarcane. Crystal clear and highly soluble, perfect for tea, coffee, and home-baked desserts.

name: Ginger (Fresh)
description: Zesty and spicy fresh ginger roots. Excellent for flavoring teas or adding a sharp kick to meat and vegetable preparations.

name: Whole Black Pepper
description: Bold and spicy whole peppercorns. Grind them fresh to release the full heat and aroma. Sourced from the best estates for maximum essential oils.

name: Brown Atta (Whole Wheat)
description: Stone-ground whole wheat flour. Retains the bran and germ, providing more fiber and nutrients than white flour. Ideal for healthy rotis.

name: Green Chili
description: Fresh, spicy, and vibrant green chilies. Picked daily to ensure crunch and heat. An essential heat source for South Asian cuisine.

name: Cumin Seeds
description: Highly aromatic whole cumin seeds. Perfect for tempering or grinding into fresh powder. Known for its digestive properties and distinct flavor.

name: Sunflower Oil
description: Light and heart-healthy sunflower oil. Low in saturated fats and rich in Vitamin E. Perfect for light frying and baking.
